com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries
Class AbstractLibrary

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.AbstractLibrary
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationElement, Library
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoreLibrary, IoLibrary, TextLibrary
public abstract class AbstractLibrary
extends Object
implements Library

An abstract library implementation that implements the action factories, action contribution factories, and function factories parts of the library contract. All subclasses have to provide is information about the library and the names of the packages in which actions, action contributions, and functions can be found. Additionally, the getDynamicActionFactory method should be overridden if the library supports dynamic actions.

The library will create default action factories for each action and default action contribution factories for each action contribution. Neither actions nor action contributions that are annotated with @Ignored will be included in the library.

To find functions, the library will scan for classes that are annotated with @FunctionClass; for every static method in those classes, a static method invoking function factory will be created. Static methods that are annotated with @Ignored won't be added to the library.

A number of common actions are added to abstract libraries in the addCommonActions method; (abstract) subclasses are free to override this method and add more common actions.
